description: Share your taxi with someone else in the queue

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["This page explains some of the ways that you can find a taxi or minicab."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
London's famous taxis (black cabs) can be booked in advance, hailed on the street, or picked up from designated taxi ranks.

{"template":"table","rows":[["\u003cstrong\u003eTaxi company\u003c/strong\u003e ","\u003cstrong\u003eContact details\u003c/strong\u003e ","\u003cstrong\u003eAreas served\u003c/strong\u003e "],["One-Number Taxi","0871 871 8710","All London"],[" \u003ca href=\"http://www.comcab-london.co.uk\"\u003eComputer Cab\u003c/a\u003e ","020 7908 0207\u003cbr /\u003eCredit/debit card bookings: 020 7432 1432\u003cbr /\u003eCash bookings: 020 7908 0207\u003cbr /\u003e \u003ca href=\"http://www.comcab-london.co.uk/bookings\"\u003eComcab bookings\u003c/a\u003e ","All London"],[" \u003ca href=\"https://www.dialacab.co.uk/\"\u003eDial-A-Cab\u003c/a\u003e ","020 7253 5000","All London"],[" \u003ca href=\"http://www.radiotaxis.co.uk/book-taxi/\"\u003eRadio Taxis\u003c/a\u003e ","020 7272 0272","All London"],[" \u003ca href=\"http://www.sw4.swlondontaxiranks.com\"\u003eClapham Common taxi rank (SW4)\u003c/a\u003e ","0800 118 2494\u003cbr /\u003e \u003ca href=\"http://Office@sw4.swlondontaxiranks.com \"\u003eOffice@sw4.swlondontaxiranks.com\u003c/a\u003e ","Clapham Common and surrounding areas."],["Southside Centre taxi rank (SW18)","0800 211 8087\u003cbr /\u003e \u003ca href=\"mailto:wandsworthtaxirank@gmail.com\"\u003ewandsworthtaxirank@gmail.com\u003c/a\u003e ","Wandsworth Southside Centre and surrounding areas"],["Sutton taxi rank (SM2)","0800 118 2192\u003cbr /\u003e \u003ca href=\"mailto:suttontaxirank@gmail.com\"\u003esuttontaxirank@gmail.com\u003c/a\u003e ","Sutton and surrounding areas."],["Taxi Call Wimbledon","020 8099 7711","Immediate hiring: Wimbledon and surrounding areas"],["Centre Court Wimbledon Taxi Rank","0800 211 8914\u003cbr /\u003e \u003ca href=\"mailto:wimbledoncentrecourttaxirank@gmail.com\"\u003ewimbledoncentrecourttaxirank@gmail.com\u003c/a\u003e ","Wimbledon and surrounding areas"]]}
There is a charge when booking by phone, and other terms and conditions may vary, so please check when booking.
If you would like to comment or complain about taxi services in London please contact us online .

links.title: Guide to taxis and private hire
